author: Msnbc
title: Despite reality, Trump claims to have 'total' authority
description: Last month, Trump said, "I don't take responsibility at all." Now, he's claiming "total" authority over all pandemic decision making.
content: For several weeks, Donald Trump was content to pass the buck. Pressed on the deadly pandemic and his administration's obvious missteps, the president famously declared, "I don't take responsibility at all," while shifting the weighty burdens onto state and lo… [+3553 chars]
